means: 结巴地说出( stammer的现在分词 )

word_mean: 口吃，讷吃：一种语言紊乱，特征是非自主的语言间断
有时结结巴巴地使用同义词，尤见于英国人

sentence.Network_en: Of all speech impediments stammering is probably the most embarrassing.
sentence.Network_cn: 在所有言语障碍中，口吃可能是最令人尴尬的。

sentence.Network_en: Stammering is probably an inherited defect.
sentence.Network_cn: 口吃很可能是一种遗传性缺陷。

sentence.Network_en: A stammering child can benefit from speech therapy.
sentence.Network_cn: 口吃的孩子可以从言语矫治中获益。

entry.def: If you stammer, you speak with difficulty, hesitating and repeating words or sounds.

example.ex: Five per cent of children stammer at some point...

entry.def: Someone who has a stammer tends to stammer when they speak.

example.tran: 一位言语矫治师治愈了他的口吃。

means.word_mean: 1. unable to speak freely and easily

auth_sentence.content: Stephan's narrative style was hesitant, oblique, slightly stammering.
auth_sentence.res_content: Stephan's narrative style was hesitant, oblique, slightly stammering.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Stephan's narrative style was hesitant, oblique, slightly stammering.

auth_sentence.content: She was caught now, blinking and stammering in the glare.

auth_sentence.content: Symptoms The severity of stammering may depend on the child's surroundings.
